welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Purral, Costa Rica! Get ready to fall in love with the city's charming streets and experience its vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Purral has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves as a hub for smaller airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
